entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail. Wind south 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:10 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 12:10 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then clearing. Wind light except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:10 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
